topic.title: Security with Software Defined Networking SDN
topic.shortdesc: Security with SDN../networking/sdn/security/sdn-security-top.md delivers many features to increase customer confidence in running workloads, either on-premises, or as a service provider in the cloud.

body.p: These security enhancements are integrated into the comprehensive SDN platform introduced in Windows Server 2016.
For a complete list of what's new in SDN see, What's New in SDN for Windows Server 2019../networking/sdn/sdn-whats-new.md.
